name: Puppy Linux Save State File
summary: File system save file used by the fourth extended file system (EXT4) of Puppy Linux; stores the state of the file system at a specific point in time and can be used for resetting the file system back to that state; saved to an external file system partition, since Puppy Linux can run standalone off of a CD or .ISO file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
